com.jbcteam4.androidgame

Class AppPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jbcteam4.androidgame.AppPreferences

  • public class AppPreferences
extends java.lang.Object
    The type AppPreferences. This class provides to application ability to store in local file it's personal settings.
